column5: I have been unsucessful in finding a dealer through Suzuki's website. I was hoping someone on this forum might know of one.I thought maybe Dryden or Kenora? Thanks in advance.Bill

There are only 2 that I found on the Suzuki Canada web site, http://marine.suzuki.ca/?sc_lang=en-CA 1) BLACK BEAR POWER PRODUCTS HWY #44 PENNIAC BAY WEST HAWK LAKE MB R0E 2H0 Canada Telephone: 204-349-8813 blackbearpowersports.com 2) Badiuk Equipment HWY 11/71 WEST FORT FRANCES ON P9A 3N1 Canada Telephone: 807-274-2264 Website: www.badiuk.com Hope that helps
I used the postal code of P0V 1T0, the nearest is 170km away. HRG
ST-Aubin Saw shop in Dryden is a Suzuki dealer.PH# 807-937-5067.

From what I have gathered, Suzuki's seem to be fairly bullet proof, so chances of needing repair work while you are there maybe may not be a high percentage problem, assuming you already have one? Bill
Bill My new boat a Backtroller have will have a Suzuki 70 hp. on it.I'm wanted to find a dealer for when we are up there"just in case".
Gottcha, should be a great motor for you. Bill
